[Reflexive Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1546) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Opportune Riposte](/Classes.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You can riposte almost without a thought. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to perform an [Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=551).
